timeline.message: Fix(logging): Fix SonarCloud issues related to logging.
Fix(sonarcloud): Fix the other critical SonarCloud issues.
Fix(SonarCloud): Fix the code smells added by the recent fixes.

timeline.bodyText: I'm pretty sure we use the RecursiveToStringStyle in our libraries. What was this issue with it?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: The sonar cloud issue was that we were using a child class to reference a static in a parent class.  The fix is to use the parent class in the static reference.
replies.author: psantos1113
